title: Zygor Guides 4.0.7790 (January 10nd, 2014)
description:
Zygor Guides update 4.0.7790, Released on: January 10nd, 2014 (Horde and Alliance)

Created by r4tulan on Friday, 10 January 5:56:21 p.m.(GMT - 8:00) PST


Install instructions: 

1) DO NOT USE THE OFFICIAL ZYGOR LAUNCHER FOR ANY REASON.

2) Extract the .zip and drop the ZygorGuidesViewer folder into your WoW/Interface/Addons folder and overwrite the current installation.


Mac-Only install instructions:

1) Put the ZygorGuidesViewer folder in Hard Drive/Applications/World of Warcraft/Interface/AddOns.

2) (Optional) Open World of Warcraft, login, click the Addons button on the Character Select Screen, make sure Zygor is selected, and check the "Load out of date addons" box. Some users have stated that this step is rarely/never necessary


Changelog:

-------


[H] Leveling
Hinterlands:
Added extra tips
Corrected step text that was being cut off
Added additional waypoints for improved navigation between quests
Broke step into two smaller steps for improved spawn locations for both steps
Added missing quest turn in step

Western Plaguelands:
Added extra tips
Added more specific instructions to make a few quests more clear and easy
Linked a quest's temporary pet skill to guide
Added additional waypoints for extra quest mobs
Added additional waypoints for improved navigation between quests
Corrected a step that was displaying wrong quest objectives
Added missing quest item ID

Northern Stranglethorn:
Added extra tips
Corrected step that wasn't completing
Added missing flight path for Grom'gol Base Camp
Added additional waypoints for extra quest mobs
Corrected an npc ID

Searing Gorge:
Added extra tips
Added additional waypoints for extra quest mobs

[H] Professions
Enchanting:
Routing issue fixed
Tip to help save time while farming added for Strange Dust
Fixed an error causing the Enchanting Vendor steps to fail to display the location and NPCid of the vendor
